[

{title, "File Element"},

{see_also, [base]},

{usage, "#file { file=\"./priv/content/stuff.html\" }"},

{description, "
  The file element reads a file from the file system, and spits out its unaltered
  contents to the browser. The file must reside in ./content/web_content/FILENAME.html"},

{attributes, [

	{"file", "String", "The name of the file, minus the trailing .html."}
	
]}

].
